name: GetPVarType
description: Gets the type (integer, float or string) of a player variable.

params_body.name: playerid
params_body.description: The ID of the player whose player variable to get the type of.

params_body.name: varname
params_body.description: The name of the player variable to get the type of.

return_values: Returns the type of the PVar. See table below.
related_fn:
SetPVarInt: Set an integer for a player variable.
 GetPVarInt: Get the previously set integer from a player variable.
 SetPVarString: Set a string for a player variable.
 GetPVarString: Get the previously set string from a player variable.
 SetPVarFloat: Set a float for a player variable.
 GetPVarFloat: Get the previously set float from a player variable.
 DeletePVar: Delete a player variable.
